alert.note: Alert for Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 4:10AM PST until March 05 at 8:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 8 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty west winds could become a hazard to high profile vehicles traveling along Interstate 15. Periods of blowing dust may also reduce driving visibility. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
